00036 #ifndef crypto_ahash_alg_name
00037 static inline const char *crypto_ahash_alg_name(struct crypto_ahash *tfm)
00038 {
00039         return crypto_tfm_alg_name(crypto_ahash_tfm(tfm));
00040 }
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 #ifndef crypto_ahash_driver_name
00044 static inline const char *crypto_ahash_driver_name(struct crypto_ahash *tfm)
00045 {
00046         return crypto_tfm_alg_driver_name(crypto_ahash_tfm(tfm));
00047 }
00048 #endif
00049 
00053 static int cfs_crypto_hash_speeds[CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX];
00054 
00072 static int cfs_crypto_hash_alloc(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg,
00073                                  const struct cfs_crypto_hash_type **type,
00074                                  struct ahash_request **req,
00075                                  unsigned char *key,
00076                                  unsigned int key_len)
00077 {
00078         struct crypto_ahash *tfm;
00079         int err = 0;
00080 
00081         *type = cfs_crypto_hash_type(hash_alg);
00082 
00083         if (*type == NULL) {
00084                 CWARN("Unsupported hash algorithm id = %d, max id is %d\n",
00085                       hash_alg, CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX);
00086                 return -EINVAL;
00087         }
00088         tfm = crypto_alloc_ahash((*type)->cht_name, 0, CRYPTO_ALG_ASYNC);
00089         if (IS_ERR(tfm)) {
00090                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Failed to alloc crypto hash %s\n",
00091                        (*type)->cht_name);
00092                 return PTR_ERR(tfm);
00093         }
00094 
00095         *req = ahash_request_alloc(tfm, GFP_KERNEL);
00096         if (!*req) {
00097                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Failed to alloc ahash_request for %s\n",
00098                        (*type)->cht_name);
00099                 crypto_free_ahash(tfm);
00100                 return -ENOMEM;
00101         }
00102 
00103         ahash_request_set_callback(*req, 0, NULL, NULL);
00104 
00105         if (key)
00106                 err = crypto_ahash_setkey(tfm, key, key_len);
00107         else if ((*type)->cht_key != 0)
00108                 err = crypto_ahash_setkey(tfm,
00109                                          (unsigned char *)&((*type)->cht_key),
00110                                          (*type)->cht_size);
00111 
00112         if (err != 0) {
00113                 ahash_request_free(*req);
00114                 crypto_free_ahash(tfm);
00115                 return err;
00116         }
00117 
00118         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Using crypto hash: %s (%s) speed %d MB/s\n",
00119                crypto_ahash_alg_name(tfm), crypto_ahash_driver_name(tfm),
00120                cfs_crypto_hash_speeds[hash_alg]);
00121 
00122         err = crypto_ahash_init(*req);
00123         if (err) {
00124                 ahash_request_free(*req);
00125                 crypto_free_ahash(tfm);
00126         }
00127         return err;
00128 }
00129 
00152 int cfs_crypto_hash_digest(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg,
00153                            const void *buf, unsigned int buf_len,
00154                            unsigned char *key, unsigned int key_len,
00155                            unsigned char *hash, unsigned int *hash_len)
00156 {
00157         struct scatterlist      sl;
00158         struct ahash_request *req;
00159         int                     err;
00160         const struct cfs_crypto_hash_type       *type;
00161 
00162         if (!buf || buf_len == 0 || !hash_len)
00163                 return -EINVAL;
00164 
00165         err = cfs_crypto_hash_alloc(hash_alg, &type, &req, key, key_len);
00166         if (err != 0)
00167                 return err;
00168 
00169         if (!hash || *hash_len < type->cht_size) {
00170                 *hash_len = type->cht_size;
00171                 crypto_free_ahash(crypto_ahash_reqtfm(req));
00172                 ahash_request_free(req);
00173                 return -ENOSPC;
00174         }
00175         sg_init_one(&sl, (void *)buf, buf_len);
00176 
00177         ahash_request_set_crypt(req, &sl, hash, sl.length);
00178         err = crypto_ahash_digest(req);
00179         crypto_free_ahash(crypto_ahash_reqtfm(req));
00180         ahash_request_free(req);
00181 
00182         return err;
00183 }
00184 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_crypto_hash_digest);
00185 
00203 struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *
00204         cfs_crypto_hash_init(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg,
00205                              unsigned char *key, unsigned int key_len)
00206 {
00207         struct ahash_request *req;
00208         int                                     err;
00209         const struct cfs_crypto_hash_type       *type;
00210 
00211         err = cfs_crypto_hash_alloc(hash_alg, &type, &req, key, key_len);
00212         if (err)
00213                 return ERR_PTR(err);
00214         return (struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *)req;
00215 }
00216 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_crypto_hash_init);
00217 
00229 int cfs_crypto_hash_update_page(struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *hdesc,
00230                                 struct page *page, unsigned int offset,
00231                                 unsigned int len)
00232 {
00233         struct ahash_request *req = (void *)hdesc;
00234         struct scatterlist sl;
00235 
00236         sg_init_table(&sl, 1);
00237         sg_set_page(&sl, page, len, offset & ~PAGE_MASK);
00238 
00239         ahash_request_set_crypt(req, &sl, NULL, sl.length);
00240         return crypto_ahash_update(req);
00241 }
00242 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_crypto_hash_update_page);
00243 
00254 int cfs_crypto_hash_update(struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *hdesc,
00255                            const void *buf, unsigned int buf_len)
00256 {
00257         struct ahash_request *req = (void *)hdesc;
00258         struct scatterlist sl;
00259 
00260         sg_init_one(&sl, (void *)buf, buf_len);
00261 
00262         ahash_request_set_crypt(req, &sl, NULL, sl.length);
00263         return crypto_ahash_update(req);
00264 }
00265 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_crypto_hash_update);
00266 
00280 int cfs_crypto_hash_final(struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *hdesc,
00281                           unsigned char *hash, unsigned int *hash_len)
00282 {
00283         struct ahash_request *req = (void *)hdesc;
00284         int size = crypto_ahash_digestsize(crypto_ahash_reqtfm(req));
00285         int err;
00286 
00287         if (!hash || !hash_len) {
00288                 err = 0;
00289                 goto free;
00290         }
00291         if (*hash_len < size) {
00292                 err = -EOVERFLOW;
00293                 goto free;
00294         }
00295 
00296         ahash_request_set_crypt(req, NULL, hash, 0);
00297         err = crypto_ahash_final(req);
00298         if (err == 0)
00299                 *hash_len = size;
00300 free:
00301         crypto_free_ahash(crypto_ahash_reqtfm(req));
00302         ahash_request_free(req);
00303 
00304         return err;
00305 }
00306 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_crypto_hash_final);
00307 
00319 static void cfs_crypto_performance_test(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg)
00320 {
00321         int                     buf_len = max(PAGE_SIZE, 1048576UL);
00322         void                    *buf;
00323         unsigned long           start, end;
00324         int                     bcount, err = 0;
00325         struct page             *page;
00326         unsigned char           hash[CFS_CRYPTO_HASH_DIGESTSIZE_MAX];
00327         unsigned int            hash_len = sizeof(hash);
00328 
00329         page = alloc_page(GFP_KERNEL);
00330         if (page == NULL) {
00331                 err = -ENOMEM;
00332                 goto out_err;
00333         }
00334 
00335         buf = kmap(page);
00336         memset(buf, 0xAD, PAGE_SIZE);
00337         kunmap(page);
00338 
00339         for (start = jiffies, end = start + msecs_to_jiffies(MSEC_PER_SEC),
00340              bcount = 0;
00341              time_before(jiffies, end) && err == 0; bcount++) {
00342                 struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *hdesc;
00343                 int i;
00344 
00345                 hdesc = cfs_crypto_hash_init(hash_alg, NULL, 0);
00346                 if (IS_ERR(hdesc)) {
00347                         err = PTR_ERR(hdesc);
00348                         break;
00349                 }
00350 
00351                 for (i = 0; i < buf_len / PAGE_SIZE; i++) {
00352                         err = cfs_crypto_hash_update_page(hdesc, page, 0,
00353                                                           PAGE_SIZE);
00354                         if (err != 0)
00355                                 break;
00356                 }
00357 
00358                 err = cfs_crypto_hash_final(hdesc, hash, &hash_len);
00359                 if (err != 0)
00360                         break;
00361         }
00362         end = jiffies;
00363         __free_page(page);
00364 out_err:
00365         if (err != 0) {
00366                 cfs_crypto_hash_speeds[hash_alg] = err;
00367                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Crypto hash algorithm %s test error: rc = %d\n",
00368                        cfs_crypto_hash_name(hash_alg), err);
00369         } else {
00370                 unsigned long   tmp;
00371 
00372                 tmp = ((bcount * buf_len / jiffies_to_msecs(end - start)) *
00373                        1000) / (1024 * 1024);
00374                 cfs_crypto_hash_speeds[hash_alg] = (int)tmp;
00375                 CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "Crypto hash algorithm %s speed = %d MB/s\n",
00376                        cfs_crypto_hash_name(hash_alg),
00377                        cfs_crypto_hash_speeds[hash_alg]);
00378         }
00379 }
00380 
00393 int cfs_crypto_hash_speed(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg)
00394 {
00395         if (hash_alg < CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX)
00396                 return cfs_crypto_hash_speeds[hash_alg];
00397 
00398         return -ENOENT;
00399 }
00400 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_crypto_hash_speed);
00401 
00420 static int cfs_crypto_test_hashes(void)
00421 {
00422         enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg;
00423 
00424         for (hash_alg = 0; hash_alg < CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX; hash_alg++)
00425                 cfs_crypto_performance_test(hash_alg);
00426 
00427         return 0;
00428 }

00430 static int adler32;
00431 
00432 #ifdef HAVE_CRC32
00433 static int crc32;
00434 #endif
00435 #ifdef HAVE_PCLMULQDQ
00436 #ifdef NEED_CRC32_ACCEL
00437 static int crc32_pclmul;
00438 #endif
00439 #ifdef NEED_CRC32C_ACCEL
00440 static int crc32c_pclmul;
00441 #endif
00442 #endif /* HAVE_PCLMULQDQ */
00443 
00449 int cfs_crypto_register(void)
00450 {
00451         request_module("crc32c");
00452 
00453         adler32 = cfs_crypto_adler32_register();
00454 
00455 #ifdef HAVE_CRC32
00456         crc32 = cfs_crypto_crc32_register();
00457 #endif
00458 #ifdef HAVE_PCLMULQDQ
00459 #ifdef NEED_CRC32_ACCEL
00460         crc32_pclmul = cfs_crypto_crc32_pclmul_register();
00461 #endif
00462 #ifdef NEED_CRC32C_ACCEL
00463         crc32c_pclmul = cfs_crypto_crc32c_pclmul_register();
00464 #endif
00465 #endif /* HAVE_PCLMULQDQ */
00466 
00467         /* check all algorithms and do performance test */
00468         cfs_crypto_test_hashes();
00469 
00470         return 0;
00471 }
00472 
00476 void cfs_crypto_unregister(void)
00477 {
00478         if (adler32 == 0)
00479                 cfs_crypto_adler32_unregister();
00480 
00481 #ifdef HAVE_CRC32
00482         if (crc32 == 0)
00483                 cfs_crypto_crc32_unregister();
00484 #endif
00485 #ifdef HAVE_PCLMULQDQ
00486 #ifdef NEED_CRC32_ACCEL
00487         if (crc32_pclmul == 0)
00488                 cfs_crypto_crc32_pclmul_unregister();
00489 #endif
00490 #ifdef NEED_CRC32C_ACCEL
00491         if (crc32c_pclmul == 0)
00492                 cfs_crypto_crc32c_pclmul_unregister();
00493 #endif
00494 #endif /* HAVE_PCLMULQDQ */
00495 }
